name: COLORTY
description:
New arcade game from BUG-Studio that will help pass the time on the trip, and check your response to 100%

Thapa in the right color and get points for it. Collect as many points and conquer the world leaderboard.

-How To play? -
In the center of the playing field is a circle. It has one of four colors. Tapan by the same color at the edge of the screen, which is a circle in the center of the playing field.

Features:
-Beautiful Game design.
-An unusual gameplay that will make playing the game again and again.
-rhythmic Sound that will not get bored.
-Table Records. Become # 1 in the world!
